title: Why women vote for India PM Narendra Modi's BJP
description: India's PM is an alpha male who leads a patriarchal party - so what's the appeal?

title: Are there affordable ways to cut your heating bill?
description: Alternatives to gas and oil heating are becoming more popular but are still expensive.

title: The 24-year-old helping people talk about their mental health
description: Ben Ogden has spent months standing with a sign telling people it's ok to talk.

title: Forced adoptions: Nurse speak out over pressure on unmarried mothers
description: A former nurse says she witnessed "callous behaviour" towards unmarried mothers forced to give up their babies.

title: No 10 network targeted with spyware, says group
description: Researchers say they warned UK officials about being targeted, but the software's makers deny the claims.

title: Falklands War: Injured veteran and nurse reunited after 40 years
description: Denzil Connick, from south Wales, was treated by Nicci Pugh in 1982 - now, 40 years on, they meet again.

title: Ukraine round-up: Lviv counts civilian dead and credible sinking warship video
description: Credible footage of sinking Russian warship surfaces as Ukraine says Russia has started its assault to seize Donbas in the east.

title: Wales' hospitality businesses struggle to recruit staff
description: One holiday park owner hires five chefs from India after being unable to fill the jobs locally.

title: Ukraine war: Donbas tourist town braces for Russian assault
description: Sviatohirsk was a tourist trail staple but is now just another place in the Donbas where people flee war.

title: Ukraine war: Dramatic images appear to show sinking Russian warship Moskva
description: Russia says the Moskva sank after an explosion of ammunition, but Ukrainians say they hit it with missiles.

title: Wayne Quilliam: Photographing the diversity of Aboriginal Australia
description: Australia has hundreds of Indigenous groups - and Wayne Quilliam is hoping to photograph them all.

title: Ukraine war: First civilian deaths in Lviv shatter sense of safety
description: The western city's mayor says the strikes show there are "no safe and unsafe locations" in Ukraine.

title: Man arrested after incident at Horse Guards in London
description: There are no reports of any injuries and there is no known risk to the public, police say.

title: Rwanda asylum critics have no solutions, says Patel
description: The home secretary responds after criticism of her refugee plan from the Archbishop of Canterbury.

title: Partygate: No easy return for Boris Johnson after Easter break
description: Boris Johnson is expected to face questions from MPs on Tuesday after being fined for breaching Covid rules.

title: Ukraine war: Captured Briton Shaun Pinner's family hope for quick resolution
description: Shaun Pinner, who is being held by Russian forces, is described as a well-respected soldier by his family.

title: Covid: Law on wearing face masks in Scotland is lifted
description: Face-covering rules have changed but people are still being strongly advised to wear them voluntarily.

title: Ukraine war: Prince Harry hails 'extraordinary' Ukraine Invictus team
description: Prince Harry voices his support for Ukraine and applauded their attendance at the Invictus Games.

title: Volunteers with cars to transport patients instead of ambulances
description: Volunteers will be sent to those who need assistance to ease pressure on ambulance services.

title: Dozens arrested at Sweden riots sparked by planned Quran burnings
description: There have been clashes between police and people angry at a far-right group's plan to burn Qurans.

title: Sewage: Ban water firm bonuses until discharges end, Lib Dems say
description: Bosses paid £27m extra since 2020 despite 1,000 sewage spills a day, according to the party's research.

title: Police disperse illegal rave in Dorset village of East Lulworth
description: Police thank East Lulworth residents for their patience while they moved on the last partygoers.

title: Households cancel streaming services to cut costs, report says
description: The rise in the cost of living has led to more households cutting their subscription services.

title: Snowdonia authority tells hikers to visit toilet before climbing
description: Some walkers 'caught short' are pooing on Wales' highest mountain.

title: Ukraine war: Mariupol defenders will fight to the end says PM
description: Capturing the city is a major strategic goal for Russia, leaving it in control of vast swathes of the country.

title: Ukraine war: How a BBC journalist's family escaped the country
description: Vitaly Shevchenko's family fled Ukraine with the help of two BBC audience members.

title: Falklands veteran recalls HMS Coventry bombing and rescue
description: Former warrant officer John Sheldon from Yeovilton helped bring burned and injured crew to safety.

title: The elderly who can't flee their Ukrainian homes
description: Intense shelling in Mykolaiv has forced many people to flee, leaving some elderly residents behind.

title: Newspaper headlines: MPs attack Welby 'rant' and PM 'led boozy party'
description: The papers cover the backlash to the archbishop's criticism of the UK's asylum plan and more No 10 party claims.
